name: BIRDMO
description:
Birdmo falls down a trap filled pit to collect delicious fruits as he tries to escape the upside down sun lava coming from above!!!

Bird controls :
  • Space :

    Jump/Flap your little wings

     (you can also walljump!)
  • WASD/Arrows : Move
  • Esc : Pause

(Controller also supported)
